data.title: Delta Sigma Pi International Business Fraternity
data.text:
Purpose

Delta Sigma Pi is a professional fraternity organized to foster the study of business in universities; to encourage scholarship, social activity and the association of students for their mutual advancement by research and practice; to promote closer affiliation between the commercial world and students of commerce, and to further a higher standard of commercial ethics and culture and the civic and commercial welfare of the community. Louisiana Tech University's Beta Psi Chapter offers membership far beyond the typical undergraduate experience. Our Co-Ed, International, organization is known as the foremost business fraternity because we equip our members throughout their lives to achieve maximum impact in their studies, careers, communities, civic involvement, and personal relationships.

Membership requirements

Attend Weekly Chapter Meetings, Chapter Events, College of Business Etiquette Dinners, & other specified College of Business Events 2.5 GPA for all members - higher than minimum required for university

* All student organizations have a minimum GPA requirement of 2.0 for general membership and 2.5 for Executive Officers.

Meeting times and location

Tuesdays at 5pm in the College of Business
